main.name: Ignacio Casal
main.description: Senior Front End Developer with 5 years of experience.
main.bio: I am a self-motivated, productive Front End Developer with 5 years of experience, known for quick problem-solving. I am currently looking for opportunities in React to further improve this skill and acquire new ones.
main.bio2: I am open and willing to learn what is necessary to achieve the objectives that are presented. I am in constant professional growth keeping myself updated with the latest technologies.

education.degree: English Certificate - Upper Intermediate (CEFR Level B2)

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: I played a role in the development and maintenance of the SaaS platform. Our primary goal was to offer location intelligence and mapping solutions. To achieve this I utilised my skills in JavaScript (Modern JS), Typescript, React, Redux and CSS to optimise the performance of the platform and increase the overall user experience. Additionally, I actively solved issues and contributed to refining and adapting the platform to meet the changing requirements of businesses that rely on location data.

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Contributed the development and maintenance of web applications for a significant US company that controls drone traffic. Utilised technologies such as React, Redux, SCSS, Webpack, and Jest. I played a leadership role in the implementation of comprehensive testing using Jest, ensuring the reliability and functionality of the code and platform.

work.title: Front End Developer (Freelance)
work.description: As a freelance developer, crafted and maintained web applications for multilevel companies using Angular, JavaScript, Typescript, Node.js and SCSS.

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Led the front-end development of innovative e-commerce platform using Angular 7, JavaScript, SCSS and Scrum as the agile development methodology.

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Led the front-end development of an innovative platform dedicated to facilitating appointment scheduling for various business types. Utilised Angular 5, JavaScript, SCSS and followed the Scrum methodology for agile development.

projects.title: Simple CRUD
projects.description: SPA that handles Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations using React and JSON Server REST API.

projects.title: Random Users
projects.description: SPA that displays sixteen random users on every refresh by using Random User Generator API. It was built using React, Node.js, Express and Webpack.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker
projects.description: This is a responsive web application that allows users track their fitness activity. It was built using Angular and Firebase.

projects.title: Image Gallery
projects.description: This is a responsive web application that allows users track their fitness activity. It was built using Angular and Firebase.
